Text: is there any place to see the contents of these "hitlists"?
SUPKIDS: Yes, at top of download screen it reads (in this case) Files: 90. Click on the '90' and the file names list out towards bottom of DL screen.

any chance of you doing the rest of the Standard Catalog of Comic Books 5th Edition ?  never heard of this on account I gave up my subscription to the Comics Buyer's Guide some years ago.  It's a fantastic series.  Have to buy this DVD.
